Paragraph.Item1: We use cookies to help improve your experience of our website at https://pet-pal.vercel.app/. This cookie policy is part of Pet-Pal's privacy policy. It covers the use of cookies between your device and our site.
Paragraph.Item2: We also provide basic information on third-party services we may use, who may also use cookies as part of their service. This policy does not cover their cookies.
Paragraph.Item3: If you donâ€™t wish to accept cookies from us, you should instruct your browser to refuse cookies from https://pet-pal.vercel.app/. In such a case, we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired content and services.
Paragraph.Item4: This policy is effective as of 24 January 2023.
